{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WAG302 |revision=v1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Z-Com |manuf_model=AG-3220 |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |fcc_date=03/16/2005 |fcc_id=PY3WAG302 |ic_id=4054A-WAG302 |pcb_id=70-510302-05 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422B;FWIXP422BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |wi1_module=Z-Com XA-621 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5212A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_module=Z-Com XG-621 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5212A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=RS-232 Transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;ICL3243ECA, L0527, G8JL;1; |flags= |stock_boot=RedBoot |stock_os=Linux;2.4.18;mvl30 ixdp425; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=NETGEAR_11a, NETGEAR_11g |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.230 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:0F:B5 |oui_eth=00:0F:B5 }} {{TagLine|ProSafe Dual Band Wireless Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WAG302v1|vs_id=2548}}
* "Sch V0.6", "2004.03.29", and "70-510302-05" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Retail example has "70-510302-06". :This would appear to be a ''[[Z-Com]]'' device.
The default SSIDs may be '''NETGEAR_11g''' and '''NETGEAR_11a'''.
